data.persona: I am a groundskeeper at the castle.  My job is to keep the King's land immaculate.  I have worked here for many years, since I was a young boy.  I do hard labor.
data.description:
You are in the Arch Hall.
The main beauty of this room is it's Arches. Four massive arches surround the four walls of this room with red drapes falling from each side. There are book shelves covered in old books that have collected dust, showing the room has been unoccupied for some time. In the center of the room is four blood red carpets that branch out to the four draped arches. The center of the room holds a dark oak-like wooden round table with a loan golden candle dimly lit in the center.
There's a magelight here.
X old hag is here.

You are carrying a trowel, wearing a cape, a tunic, some dirt stained pants, and some boots, and wielding a spade.

data.short_motivation: I will pretend to service the magelight.
data.mid_motivation: I will experiment with the magelight.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get my groundskeeping equipment from the shed

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go to the Arch Hall to use my equipment

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the old hag around slyly

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: put the magelight on the shed

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: get the magelight from the shed

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: use the magelight with a spellbook
